description.en: Iotexpad is the first launchpad native to the Iotex ecosystem. Built, launched, and powered by Iotex. A fast, secure, and scalable layer-2 solution on Ethereum. $TEX will ensue to be an integral part of the Iotex ecosystem designated to entail a vast number of services to emerging projects developing on the XRC-20 network. Iotexpad is a top tier incubator for the iotex ecosystem.
